ID: CSQSFVC_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-24 13:35
Subject: Major Incident Notification:  Network Connectivity Issue in Guess Stores, Muscat
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

Dear Colleague, 

 

Guess & L'Occitane at Muscat City Centre and Guess at Mall of Oman are currently facing connectivity issues due to a payment issue. 

 

While the stores can continue operating offline, customer lookup and loyalty point redemption are unavailable at this time.

 

Issue Reported: Network Connectivity Issue in Guess Stores, Muscat

Start Date and Time: 24 Mar 2025 , 12.17 PM GST

 

Status: Notification

 

If you require any assistance during this timeframe, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting OneReach.

 

Click here for more updates: Chalhoub Technology & Data Service Status <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

Chalhoub Technology & Data Status Page <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

Subscribe <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/subscriber/account>
